name: proc-that
description: proc(ess)-that - easy extendable etl tool for nodejs written in typesript

scripts.pretest: npm install && typings install && npm run clean && tsc
scripts.build: rimraf build dist && tsc --outDir dist -d && trash dist/**/*.spec* && trash dist/Etl.spec* && typings bundle --out dist && trash dist/browser.d.ts
